subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: It is rare, N.B.A. team executives say, that a player like Greg Oden possesses the physical prowess and crisp fundamentals that could alter a franchise’s future.
snippet: It is rare, N.B.A. team executives say, that a player like Greg Oden possesses the physical prowess and crisp fundamentals that could alter a franchise’s future.
